MajorClaims.MC1: both learning by myself and learning with a teacher could be helpful
MajorClaims.MC2: both can help and each of them has its own advantages and disadvantages

Claims.C1: Learning with a teacher can prevent one from being confused and increase the rate and speed of learning
Claims.C2: for practical subjects you have to have a teacher
Claims.C3: sometimes I would rather learning on my own
Claims.C4: it is good to learn with a teacher and sometimes on my own
Claims.C5: I will learn faster and better and won't get discouraged and confused
Claims.C6: There are some practical subjects that you can only learn them with a teacher or an instructor
Claims.C7: There are some things that I prefer to learn them without a teacher

Premises.P1: A good and experienced teacher can help me learn faster and easier
Premises.P2: Sometimes when learning a course by myself which is hard and confusing to understand and has few sources available, I get discouraged after spending a lot of time
Premises.P3: In this situation, I'll look for a teacher and request for help from him or her
Premises.P4: And then he or she will teach me the course efficiently in a short time
Premises.P5: if you want to learn driving a car or some jobs like medicine and engineering and some sports like skiing and swimming, you'll have to find a teacher
Premises.P6: It's almost impossible and inefficient to learn those things on your own
Premises.P7: if you are going to learn some things by yourself, you may learn and understand them incorrectly
Premises.P8: from my own experiences, after I had started learning playing the guitar without a teacher, I got used to wrong habits regarding strumming and tempo, but after finding and learning with a tutor and identifying and eliminating those incorrect habits, I was able to play properly
Premises.P9: I won't have to spend extra money for a teacher and my time will not be wasted either because of going to classes
Premises.P10: In today's world there are many great and useful sources available like books, electronic books, the internet and TV and satellite
Premises.P11: I can utilize them as tutorials for many things
Premises.P12: I can learn English or other languages by a lot of helpful books and many online websites
